item.description:
This meetupÂ® is intended provide (new? confused?) developers a means of support via shared information & approaches ranging across the spectrum of iPhone development. The topics covered and technical level of the discussion will depend largely on the interests and skill levels of those who attend.

Ideas/problems welcome:
Please let me know if there's anything you'd like to present, problems you need solved or topics you'd like to hear about at this or a future meeting. For now: Members are invited to make short (5-20 minute) presentations without having mentioned it prior and/or propose ideas for a longer presentation.

Regardless: I'll generally be prepared with ideas/questions aimed at advancing our abilities to make these @$#% gadgets do what we want them to do.
I hope to see you there and/or hear from you in advance about any questions/suggestions you may have, including hours/days that work better for you.
item.how_to_find_us: Sign in at front desk, up to 2nd floor & back to room 207 on right side of hall.
item.name: The 2nd Inaugural iPhone Development Meeting!
